players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Since Diana was killed last night, we need to be extra careful. Alice, you stayed silent—can you share your thoughts on who seems suspicious?"
Bob: "Alice is the mafioso. We should focus on voting her out immediately."
Charlie: "Alice, Bob's quick accusation feels a bit too convenient. We should discuss more before deciding. Bob, why do you suspect Alice so strongly?"
Bob: "Alice's silence and refusal to defend herself after being accused only strengthens my suspicion. We must vote her out now to protect the town."
